pullRequest.title: Issue #7726: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - AvoidStaticImport
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #7726
Log Update:

  
    
      checkstyle/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/imports/AvoidStaticImportCheck.java
    
    
         Line 128
      in
      5ec8cfe
    
    
    
    

        
          
           log(startingDot.getLineNo(), MSG_KEY, name.getText()); 
        
    
  


Diff Report: https://gaurabdg.github.io/checkstyle-tester-reports/regression/AvoidStaticImport/diff/index.html

nodes.bodyText: No need for method, can be removed

nodes.bodyText: This is outside the scope of the issue, but please - this import in file and duplicated violation, please remove them.
nodes.diffHunk:

         final DefaultConfiguration checkConfig =
             createModuleConfig(AvoidStaticImportCheck.class);
         final String[] expected = {
-            "23: " + getCheckMessage(MSG_KEY, "java.io.File.listRoots"),

nodes.bodyText:
Please confirm why line number changed from 32 to 31.

  
    
      checkstyle/src/test/resources/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/imports/avoidstaticimport/InputAvoidStaticImportDefault.java
    
    
         Line 31
      in
      555199e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           import static com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.imports.avoidstaticimport.InputAvoidStaticImportNestedClass.InnerClass; 
        
    
  


I am not seeing a reason why in the file as it doesn't span more than 1 line.
